casebody.data:
WAKE FOREST UNIVERSITY HEALTH SCIENCES v. NORTH CAROLINA DEPT. OF HEALTH AND HUMAN SERVICES. Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed November 21, 2006. Certification Date December 11, 2006. Appeal from the Dept. of Health & Human Services (04DHR1406).

COA05-1597.

Case reported without published opinion. Affirmed.
